item.title: Surprising Trick: Install Windows 10 Without USB - Here's How!
item.description: Introduction Are you looking for an easy way to install Windows 10 without using a USB drive? Well, you’re in luck! In this blog post, we’ll show you a surprisingly simple trick that will allow you to install Windows 10 without the need for a USB drive. Overview of the Process The process of installing Windows 10 without a USB drive is surprisingly simple. All you need to do is download the Windows 10 ISO file from Microsoft’s website and then use a tool called Rufus to create a bootable Windows 10 installation disk on your computer’s hard drive.
